catalog_info.title: Topics in Random Matrices
catalog_info.notes: We will assume stochastic calculus and a basic knowledge of random matrix theory.
catalog_info.description: A discussion of a few advanced topics in random matrix theory. Topics include: analysis of Dyson Brownian motions via PDE method, eigenvector flows and beta ensembles. Depending on the progress of the class, other topics will be added.   A quick overview of random matrix theory will be given in the beginning of the course.
